description: Projectors are guides and managers, designed to see into others and direct energy efficiently.

protocol.decision_making: Wait for recognition and invitation before offering guidance
protocol.energy_management: Non-sacral being - needs rest and selective energy use
stress_indicators: Exhaustion from trying to keep up with Generators

optimal_approach.work: Focus on mastery and wait for invitations to share your gifts
optimal_approach.relationships: Wait for recognition before going deep
optimal_approach.decisions: Trust your authority - test invitations against your strategy

stress_mapping.recovery_protocol: Rest deeply and focus on self-study and mastery
